bug.author: annxingyuan
bug.summary: Benchmarking page reports inaccurate results for async predict
bug.description: The existing logic accounting for whether the model asynchronously predicts is insufficient. Also, sometimes it's necessary to call executeAsync rather than predict. Working version in this branch: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-core/tree/prototype_webgl_cpu_handoff>https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-core/tree/prototype_webgl_cpu_handoff</denchmark-link>
